Sections.Text: A deathly quiet descends on Bosch Manor, as the last of the Intruders slips into the afterlife.
Cornelius Bosch has survived, if not exactly in the same state in which he used to live. But his important work continues.
The great work can continue, and even as his old body expires, Bosch has already begun work on a new one - an artificial form more powerful than any living being.
And Tyree, that wretched man, his soul now serves as fodder for the master's experiments.
The history of this house has only begun. And the name Bosch will be tied to it for eternity.
